title: How long do 2,500 words take to write? - Quora

response.answer_text: A famous author once was asked; How many words do you write every day? The author replied: sometimes, 30,000 and sometimes only three. What took you so long to write only three words? asked the enquirer. The author replied. I cound not decide which order to put them in. The time spent actually writing is far less than the time spent imagining the story. Today I have written the first 250 words of my story of 2500 words. I have 10 days to improve and expand those 250 words by 100% to reach my wordcount target.
